titles.title: From Every Stormy Wind That Blows (easy nice t

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}From ev'ry stormy wind that blows From ev'ry swelling tide of woes There is a calm a sure retreat 'Tis found beneath the mercy seat{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}There is a place where Jesus sheds The oil of gladness on our heads A place than all besides more sweet It is the blood-bought mercy seat{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}there is a scene where spirits blend Where friend holds fellowship with friend Though parted far by faith they meet Around one common mercy seat{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}There there on eagle's wings we soar And time and sense seem all no more And heaven comes down our souls to greet And glory crowns the mercy seat{/lang-eng}
